column5: Heading to Sault Ste. Marie for a road trip this weekend with some buddies, leaving from the GTA. Looking for a lake to spend a day of fishing along the way. Boat Rental / Shore fishing are both options. We're all fairly new to fishing. I would love to catch my first walleye, but bass / pike fishing wouldnt be so bad either. Any suggestions?
Send Tdunn a PM. He was very helpful to me when I went up to the Soo this summer.
